scripts.dry: npm run build && node node_modules/idembot/bin/run.js --file bin/rules.js --query all-open-prs.json --dry
scripts.wet: npm run build && node node_modules/idembot/bin/run.js --file bin/rules.js --query all-open-prs.json
scripts.single: npm run build && node node_modules/idembot/bin/run.js --file bin/rules.js --single
